title: Server problems?
body: Anyone else just get d/c from their game? Playing along nicely winning my lane then everyone bar a few on the enemy team disconnect giving them back the lead. Same thing happened as they were sieging our base. Everyone disconnects, check game history and we lost.

replies.body:
Thanks for the replys folks.

It looks like there was a maintenance from one of our providers which took out a peering link unexpectedly.  This would have mainly affected players from Spark, iiNet or associated ISPs (Adam, Internode etc).

The maintenance is over now, so we should be in the clear.

Mindstar
I think its a big fucking joke that i got put into low priority queue for this.

> The maintenance is over now, so we should be in the clear.

Is there going to be any sort of compensation for this?  I'd assume that you probably won't, because you might not be tracking who actually had LP issues with regards to this.
Riot does not directly own the network players use to connect to their servers, so they cannot compensate players for something that they are not responsible for.

I thought they might not.  It definitely sucks though, as I did read players saying they'd lost LP and/or been demoted as a result.  If they can't do anything, then they can't do anything, but someone's probably going to be up in arms over it anyway.
I can't even reconnect to the game now

Hopefully we'll hear something from Rito soon. I found leaving the game and rejoining reconnected me to the game, in case anyone is having trouble reconnecting.

Really wanted to smash out a bunch of ranked games tonight as well :(
That doesn't work for me, it's only got like a 20% success rate.  I fixed it once by just waiting for about 5 minutes, but after that, nothing.  It doesn't stop the disconnecting.
It worked for me both times I disconnected, must have gotten lucky.

Just received my a reply from my support ticket saying that Riot would not be rescinding my low priority que because they "cant". 

What an absolute fucking joke. You need to treat your playerbase better than this. If something (like this for example) happens beyond their control and your automatic indiscriminate punishment system hands then a ban or demotion or low priority que, you guys need to get off your asses and bloody well fix it.

This is seriously really fucking poor on your behalf.

Hey guys,

What ISPs are you all with, and what city are you playing from?

Cheers
Mindstar
Optus (NBN), Penrith NSW
Sunshine Coast, IInet
Adelaide SA, Adam Internet.
Sydney NSW, Internode
Canberra, ACT, iinet
telstra and from perth
Brisbane, Queensland for me. My ISP is iiNet
i was playing in Clayton Victoria, from an internet cafe called beyond internet cafe  i can ask them when i go in next either tonight or tommorow.
I didn't get d/c, but im getting a constant increase of ping. Usually I was around the 20-30ms ping, now its around 100-200ms ping. Only happened today....
Any news on this?

Getting the same thing, last game 3 people including myself got dc'd continuously and weren't allowed back in the game for 5 minutes, then got dc'd 20 seconds into playing again. Now it's not letting me connect to my current game and apparently there is another player disconnected also as the person i am duo with has told me. Would like to know what the issue is?
Just tried to log back onto the client, after closing the game and got a data corruption notice. My game is currently repairing. Wonder if that's linked at all?
plz riot,fix it!!!!!
This is a f*cking joke. We had better not be stuck with any demotions.

Update on my ARAM: team won with three people disconnected from the game, but I got counted as a leaver.  I haven't been hit with low priority queues, but that's probably only because I never, ever leave games.  I'd advise everyone to stay off this game for like half a day.
Just got demoted cause i Kept dcing lol? Was reconnecting all over but at the end of the game said leave ... what is life
sort this out. i better not get effen banned
Riot the status of your serves are a goddamn joke.
Yeah, happened three times in an ARAM I'm currently still attempting to reconnect to.

Yeah, I had a game where several players on both teams, including myself, disconnected at once. I just made a thread about it as well, haha. My team managed to win, but the enemy team didn't get loss prevented, which is bullshit. Also tried to queue for another, but got a loading message when lobby popped. I'd suggest people stop playing for the night, in case this further fucks stuff up.
Yep, 2 on our team 1 on the opposite (including me). 3 times in 1 game.
Happening in my ranked game too :(
Can we make this noticeable so riot can actually solve this problem.... having this issue now....
same happened to me and I got demoted gj riot
